document_data.name: Old Goatbeard
document_data.mainbody: '''Old Goatbeard''' was the skilled [[yak-folk]] governor of the [[Red Goat]] province in the [[World Pillar Mountains]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Activities: Old Goatbeard was a member of the [[Seven Sages]] and the appointed governor of the Red Goat province within the [[Yikarian Empire]]. He was well known for his collection of courtesans, all of whom lived within his small but splendid palace on the shores of the [[Lake of the Emerald Eye]].
document_data.Skills: In addition to being a powerful [[wizard]] and priest of the [[Faceless God]], Old Goatbeard was a master shapeshifter who used this ability to develop rogue-like skills.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Discrete circles of yikarians were aware that Old Goatbeard smuggled goods through the [[Blackwash Fens]] near [[Lipo]].
